# XmlWriterExtensions.CloneOrCreateSettings method

Extension method to clone Settings or create a new XmlWriterSettings if it is null.

```csharp
public static XmlWriterSettings CloneOrCreateSettings(this XmlWriter writer)
```

## Return Value

A new XmlWriterSettings object
